mn38:1.2_0: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
mn38:2.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena sātissa nāma bhikkhuno kevaṭṭaputtassa evarūpaṁ pāpakaṁ diṭṭhigataṁ uppannaṁ hoti:
mn38:2.2_0: “tathāhaṁ bhagavatā dhammaṁ desitaṁ ājānāmi yathā tadevidaṁ viññāṇaṁ sandhāvati saṁsarati anaññan”ti.
mn38:3.2_0: “sātissa kira nāma bhikkhuno kevaṭṭaputtassa evarūpaṁ pāpakaṁ diṭṭhigataṁ uppannaṁ:
mn38:3.3_0: ‘tathāhaṁ bhagavatā dhammaṁ desitaṁ ājānāmi yathā tadevidaṁ viññāṇaṁ sandhāvati saṁsarati,
mn38:3.4_0: Atha kho te bhikkhū yena sāti bhikkhu kevaṭṭaputto tenupasaṅkamiṁsu;
mn38:3.5_0: “saccaṁ kira te, āvuso sāti, evarūpaṁ pāpakaṁ diṭṭhigataṁ uppannaṁ:
mn38:3.6_0: ‘tathāhaṁ bhagavatā dhammaṁ desitaṁ ājānāmi yathā tadevidaṁ viññāṇaṁ sandhāvati saṁsarati,
mn38:3.7_1: bhagavatā dhammaṁ desitaṁ ājānāmi yathā tadevidaṁ viññāṇaṁ sandhāvati saṁsarati,
mn38:3.8_0: Atha kho te bhikkhū sātiṁ bhikkhuṁ kevaṭṭaputtaṁ etasmā pāpakā diṭṭhigatā vivecetukāmā samanuyuñjanti samanugāhanti samanubhāsanti:
mn38:3.11_0: Evampi kho sāti bhikkhu kevaṭṭaputto tehi bhikkhūhi samanuyuñjiyamāno samanugāhiyamāno samanubhāsiyamāno
mn38:3.11_1: tadeva pāpakaṁ diṭṭhigataṁ thāmasā parāmāsā abhinivissa voharati:
mn38:3.12_1: bhagavatā dhammaṁ desitaṁ ājānāmi yathā tadevidaṁ viññāṇaṁ sandhāvati saṁsarati anaññan”ti.
mn38:4.1_0: Yato kho te bhikkhū nāsakkhiṁsu sātiṁ bhikkhuṁ kevaṭṭaputtaṁ etasmā pāpakā diṭṭhigatā vivecetuṁ,
mn38:4.1_1: atha kho te bhikkhū yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṁsu;
mn38:4.1_3: Ekamantaṁ nisinnā kho te bhikkhū bhagavantaṁ etadavocuṁ:
mn38:4.2_0: “sātissa nāma, bhante, bhikkhuno kevaṭṭaputtassa evarūpaṁ pāpakaṁ diṭṭhigataṁ uppannaṁ:
mn38:4.3_0: ‘tathāhaṁ bhagavatā dhammaṁ desitaṁ ājānāmi yathā tadevidaṁ viññāṇaṁ sandhāvati saṁsarati,
mn38:4.4_1: sātissa kira nāma bhikkhuno kevaṭṭaputtassa evarūpaṁ pāpakaṁ diṭṭhigataṁ uppannaṁ:
mn38:4.5_0: ‘tathāhaṁ bhagavatā dhammaṁ desitaṁ ājānāmi yathā tadevidaṁ viññāṇaṁ sandhāvati saṁsarati,
mn38:4.7_0: ‘saccaṁ kira te, āvuso sāti, evarūpaṁ pāpakaṁ diṭṭhigataṁ uppannaṁ:
mn38:4.8_0: “tathāhaṁ bhagavatā dhammaṁ desitaṁ ājānāmi yathā tadevidaṁ viññāṇaṁ sandhāvati saṁsarati,
mn38:4.9_0: Evaṁ vutte, bhante, sāti bhikkhu kevaṭṭaputto amhe etadavoca:
mn38:4.10_1: bhagavatā dhammaṁ desitaṁ ājānāmi yathā tadevidaṁ viññāṇaṁ sandhāvati saṁsarati,
mn38:4.11_1: sātiṁ bhikkhuṁ kevaṭṭaputtaṁ etasmā pāpakā diṭṭhigatā vivecetukāmā samanuyuñjimha samanugāhimha samanubhāsimha:
mn38:4.14_1: sāti bhikkhu kevaṭṭaputto amhehi samanuyuñjiyamāno samanugāhiyamāno samanubhāsiyamāno tadeva pāpakaṁ
mn38:4.15_1: bhagavatā dhammaṁ desitaṁ ājānāmi yathā tadevidaṁ viññāṇaṁ sandhāvati saṁsarati,
mn38:4.16_1: nāsakkhimha sātiṁ bhikkhuṁ kevaṭṭaputtaṁ etasmā pāpakā diṭṭhigatā vivecetuṁ,
mn38:5.1_0: Atha kho bhagavā aññataraṁ bhikkhuṁ āmantesi:
mn38:5.2_0: “ehi tvaṁ bhikkhu, mama vacanena sātiṁ bhikkhuṁ kevaṭṭaputtaṁ āmantehi:
mn38:5.4_1: bhante”ti kho so bhikkhu bhagavato paṭissutvā yena sāti bhikkhu kevaṭṭaputto tenupasaṅkami;
mn38:5.6_0: “Evamāvuso”ti kho sāti bhikkhu kevaṭṭaputto tassa bhikkhuno paṭissutvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
mn38:5.6_2: Ekamantaṁ nisinnaṁ kho sātiṁ bhikkhuṁ kevaṭṭaputtaṁ bhagavā etadavoca:
mn38:5.7_0: “saccaṁ kira te, sāti, evarūpaṁ pāpakaṁ diṭṭhigataṁ uppannaṁ:
mn38:5.8_0: ‘tathāhaṁ bhagavatā dhammaṁ desitaṁ ājānāmi yathā tadevidaṁ viññāṇaṁ sandhāvati saṁsarati,
mn38:5.9_1: bhagavatā dhammaṁ desitaṁ ājānāmi yathā tadevidaṁ viññāṇaṁ sandhāvati saṁsarati,
mn38:5.11_0: “Yvāyaṁ, bhante, vado vedeyyo tatra tatra kalyāṇapāpakānaṁ kammānaṁ vipākaṁ paṭisaṁvedetī”ti.
mn38:5.12_0: “Kassa nu kho nāma tvaṁ, moghapurisa, mayā evaṁ dhammaṁ desitaṁ ājānāsi?
mn38:5.15_0: Tañhi te, moghapurisa, bhavissati dīgharattaṁ ahitāya dukkhāyā”ti.
mn38:6.3_0: api nāyaṁ sāti bhikkhu kevaṭṭaputto usmīkatopi imasmiṁ dhammavinaye”ti?
mn38:6.6_1: sāti bhikkhu kevaṭṭaputto tuṇhībhūto maṅkubhūto pattakkhandho adhomukho pajjhāyanto appaṭibhāno nisīdi.
mn38:6.7_0: Atha kho bhagavā sātiṁ bhikkhuṁ kevaṭṭaputtaṁ tuṇhībhūtaṁ maṅkubhūtaṁ pattakkhandhaṁ adhomukhaṁ pajjhāyantaṁ
mn38:6.7_1: appaṭibhānaṁ viditvā sātiṁ bhikkhuṁ kevaṭṭaputtaṁ etadavoca:
mn38:6.8_0: “paññāyissasi kho tvaṁ, moghapurisa, etena sakena pāpakena diṭṭhigatena.
mn38:7.2_2: evaṁ dhammaṁ desitaṁ ājānātha yathāyaṁ sāti bhikkhu kevaṭṭaputto attanā duggahitena amhe ceva abbhācikkhati,
mn38:7.6_0: Sādhu kho me tumhe, bhikkhave, evaṁ dhammaṁ desitaṁ ājānātha.
mn38:7.8_0: Atha ca panāyaṁ sāti bhikkhu kevaṭṭaputto attanā duggahitena amhe ceva abbhācikkhati,
mn38:7.9_0: Tañhi tassa moghapurisassa bhavissati dīgharattaṁ ahitāya dukkhāya.
mn38:8.2_0: Cakkhuñca paṭicca rūpe ca uppajjati viññāṇaṁ, cakkhuviññāṇantveva saṅkhyaṁ gacchati;
mn38:8.3_0: sotañca paṭicca sadde ca uppajjati viññāṇaṁ, sotaviññāṇantveva saṅkhyaṁ gacchati;
mn38:8.4_0: ghānañca paṭicca gandhe ca uppajjati viññāṇaṁ, ghānaviññāṇantveva saṅkhyaṁ gacchati;
mn38:8.5_0: jivhañca paṭicca rase ca uppajjati viññāṇaṁ, jivhāviññāṇantveva saṅkhyaṁ gacchati;
mn38:8.6_0: kāyañca paṭicca phoṭṭhabbe ca uppajjati viññāṇaṁ, kāyaviññāṇantveva saṅkhyaṁ gacchati;
mn38:8.7_0: manañca paṭicca dhamme ca uppajjati viññāṇaṁ, manoviññāṇantveva saṅkhyaṁ gacchati.
mn38:8.8_0: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, yaṁ yadeva paccayaṁ paṭicca aggi jalati tena teneva saṅkhyaṁ gacchati.
mn38:8.9_0: Kaṭṭhañca paṭicca aggi jalati, kaṭṭhaggitveva saṅkhyaṁ gacchati;
mn38:8.10_0: sakalikañca paṭicca aggi jalati, sakalikaggitveva saṅkhyaṁ gacchati;
mn38:8.11_0: tiṇañca paṭicca aggi jalati, tiṇaggitveva saṅkhyaṁ gacchati;
mn38:8.12_0: gomayañca paṭicca aggi jalati, gomayaggitveva saṅkhyaṁ gacchati;
mn38:8.13_0: thusañca paṭicca aggi jalati, thusaggitveva saṅkhyaṁ gacchati;
mn38:8.14_0: saṅkārañca paṭicca aggi jalati, saṅkāraggitveva saṅkhyaṁ gacchati.
mn38:8.15_2: yaṁ yadeva paccayaṁ paṭicca uppajjati viññāṇaṁ,
mn38:8.16_0: Cakkhuñca paṭicca rūpe ca uppajjati viññāṇaṁ, cakkhuviññāṇantveva saṅkhyaṁ gacchati;
mn38:8.17_0: sotañca paṭicca sadde ca uppajjati viññāṇaṁ, sotaviññāṇantveva saṅkhyaṁ gacchati,
mn38:8.18_0: ghānañca paṭicca gandhe ca uppajjati viññāṇaṁ, ghānaviññāṇantveva saṅkhyaṁ gacchati,
mn38:8.19_0: jivhañca paṭicca rase ca uppajjati viññāṇaṁ, jivhāviññāṇantveva saṅkhyaṁ gacchati.
mn38:8.20_0: Kāyañca paṭicca phoṭṭhabbe ca uppajjati viññāṇaṁ, kāyaviññāṇantveva saṅkhyaṁ gacchati.
mn38:8.21_0: Manañca paṭicca dhamme ca uppajjati viññāṇaṁ, manoviññāṇantveva saṅkhyaṁ gacchati.
mn38:9.5_0: “Tadāhāranirodhā yaṁ bhūtaṁ, taṁ nirodhadhammanti, bhikkhave, passathā”ti?
mn38:11.1_0: “Bhūtamidanti, bhikkhave, yathābhūtaṁ sammappaññāya passato yā vicikicchā sā pahīyatī”ti?
mn38:11.3_0: “Tadāhārasambhavanti, bhikkhave, yathābhūtaṁ sammappaññāya passato yā vicikicchā sā pahīyatī”ti?
mn38:11.5_3: yathābhūtaṁ sammappaññāya passato yā vicikicchā sā pahīyatī”ti?
mn38:12.5_0: “Tadāhāranirodhā yaṁ bhūtaṁ taṁ nirodhadhammanti, bhikkhave, itipi vo ettha nibbicikicchā”ti?
mn38:13.5_0: “Tadāhāranirodhā yaṁ bhūtaṁ taṁ nirodhadhammanti, bhikkhave, yathābhūtaṁ sammappaññāya sudiṭṭhan”ti?
mn38:14.1_2: diṭṭhiṁ evaṁ parisuddhaṁ evaṁ pariyodātaṁ allīyetha kelāyetha dhanāyetha mamāyetha,
mn38:14.1_5: kullūpamaṁ dhammaṁ desitaṁ ājāneyyātha nittharaṇatthāya no gahaṇatthāyā”ti?
mn38:14.3_2: diṭṭhiṁ evaṁ parisuddhaṁ evaṁ pariyodātaṁ na allīyetha na kelāyetha na dhanāyetha na mamāyetha,
mn38:14.3_5: kullūpamaṁ dhammaṁ desitaṁ ājāneyyātha nittharaṇatthāya no gahaṇatthāyā”ti?
mn38:15.1_0: “Cattārome, bhikkhave, āhārā bhūtānaṁ vā sattānaṁ ṭhitiyā, sambhavesīnaṁ vā anuggahāya.
mn38:15.3_0: Kabaḷīkāro āhāro oḷāriko vā sukhumo vā, phasso dutiyo, manosañcetanā tatiyā, viññāṇaṁ catutthaṁ.
mn38:16.1_0: Ime ca, bhikkhave, cattāro āhārā kiṁnidānā kiṁsamudayā kiṁjātikā kiṁpabhavā?
mn38:16.2_0: Ime cattāro āhārā taṇhānidānā taṇhāsamudayā taṇhājātikā taṇhāpabhavā.
mn38:16.3_0: Taṇhā cāyaṁ, bhikkhave, kiṁnidānā kiṁsamudayā kiṁjātikā kiṁpabhavā?
mn38:16.5_0: Vedanā cāyaṁ, bhikkhave, kiṁnidānā kiṁsamudayā kiṁjātikā kiṁpabhavā?
mn38:16.7_0: Phasso cāyaṁ, bhikkhave, kiṁnidāno kiṁsamudayo kiṁjātiko kiṁpabhavo?
mn38:16.9_0: Saḷāyatanañcidaṁ, bhikkhave, kiṁnidānaṁ kiṁsamudayaṁ kiṁjātikaṁ kiṁpabhavaṁ?
mn38:16.11_0: Nāmarūpañcidaṁ, bhikkhave, kiṁnidānaṁ kiṁsamudayaṁ kiṁjātikaṁ kiṁpabhavaṁ?
mn38:16.13_0: Viññāṇañcidaṁ, bhikkhave, kiṁnidānaṁ kiṁsamudayaṁ kiṁjātikaṁ kiṁpabhavaṁ?
mn38:16.15_0: Saṅkhārā cime, bhikkhave, kiṁnidānā kiṁsamudayā kiṁjātikā kiṁpabhavā?
mn38:18.1_0: Jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇanti iti kho panetaṁ vuttaṁ;
mn38:18.2_0: jātipaccayā nu kho, bhikkhave, jarāmaraṇaṁ, no vā, kathaṁ vā ettha hotī”ti?
mn38:18.7_0: bhavapaccayā nu kho, bhikkhave, jāti, no vā, kathaṁ vā ettha hotī”ti?
mn38:18.12_0: upādānapaccayā nu kho, bhikkhave, bhavo, no vā, kathaṁ vā ettha hotī”ti?
mn38:18.21_0: vedanāpaccayā nu kho, bhikkhave, taṇhā, no vā, kathaṁ vā ettha hotī”ti?
mn38:18.26_0: phassapaccayā nu kho, bhikkhave, vedanā, no vā, kathaṁ vā ettha hotī”ti?
mn38:18.31_0: saḷāyatanapaccayā nu kho, bhikkhave, phasso, no vā, kathaṁ vā ettha hotī”ti?
mn38:18.36_0: nāmarūpapaccayā nu kho, bhikkhave, saḷāyatanaṁ, no vā, kathaṁ vā ettha hotī”ti?
mn38:18.41_0: viññāṇapaccayā nu kho, bhikkhave, nāmarūpaṁ, no vā, kathaṁ vā ettha hotī”ti?
mn38:18.46_0: saṅkhārapaccayā nu kho, bhikkhave, viññāṇaṁ, no vā, kathaṁ vā ettha hotī”ti?
mn38:18.51_0: avijjāpaccayā nu kho, bhikkhave, saṅkhārā, no vā, kathaṁ vā ettha hotī”ti?
mn38:19.2_0: Iti kho, bhikkhave, tumhepi evaṁ vadetha, ahampi evaṁ vadāmi—
mn38:19.3_0: imasmiṁ sati idaṁ hoti, imassuppādā idaṁ uppajjati, yadidaṁ—
mn38:21.1_0: Jātinirodhā jarāmaraṇanirodhoti iti kho panetaṁ vuttaṁ;
mn38:21.2_0: jātinirodhā nu kho, bhikkhave, jarāmaraṇanirodho, no vā, kathaṁ vā ettha hotī”ti?
mn38:21.7_0: bhavanirodhā nu kho, bhikkhave, jātinirodho, no vā, kathaṁ vā ettha hotī”ti?
mn38:21.12_0: upādānanirodhā nu kho, bhikkhave, bhavanirodho, no vā, kathaṁ vā ettha hotī”ti?
mn38:21.17_0: taṇhānirodhā nu kho, bhikkhave, upādānanirodho, no vā, kathaṁ vā ettha hotī”ti?
mn38:21.22_0: vedanānirodhā nu kho, bhikkhave, taṇhānirodho, no vā, kathaṁ vā ettha hotī”ti?
mn38:21.27_0: phassanirodhā nu kho, bhikkhave, vedanānirodho, no vā, kathaṁ vā ettha hotī”ti?
mn38:21.32_0: saḷāyatananirodhā nu kho, bhikkhave, phassanirodho, no vā, kathaṁ vā ettha hotīti?
mn38:21.37_0: nāmarūpanirodhā nu kho, bhikkhave, saḷāyatananirodho, no vā, kathaṁ vā ettha hotī”ti?
mn38:21.42_0: viññāṇanirodhā nu kho, bhikkhave, nāmarūpanirodho, no vā, kathaṁ vā ettha hotī”ti?
mn38:21.47_0: saṅkhāranirodhā nu kho, bhikkhave, viññāṇanirodho, no vā, kathaṁ vā ettha hotī”ti?
mn38:21.52_0: avijjānirodhā nu kho, bhikkhave, saṅkhāranirodho, no vā, kathaṁ vā ettha hotī”ti?
mn38:22.2_0: Iti kho, bhikkhave, tumhepi evaṁ vadetha, ahampi evaṁ vadāmi—
mn38:22.3_0: imasmiṁ asati idaṁ na hoti, imassa nirodhā idaṁ nirujjhati, yadidaṁ—
mn38:23.1_0: Api nu tumhe, bhikkhave, evaṁ jānantā evaṁ passantā pubbantaṁ vā paṭidhāveyyātha:
mn38:23.2_4: kiṁ hutvā kiṁ ahesumha nu kho mayaṁ atītamaddhānan’”ti?
mn38:23.4_0: “Api nu tumhe, bhikkhave, evaṁ jānantā evaṁ passantā aparantaṁ vā paṭidhāveyyātha—
mn38:23.5_4: kiṁ hutvā kiṁ bhavissāma nu kho mayaṁ anāgatamaddhānan”ti?
mn38:24.1_2: evaṁ jānantā evaṁ passantā etarahi vā paccuppannamaddhānaṁ ajjhattaṁ kathaṅkathī assatha—
mn38:24.2_4: ayaṁ nu kho satto kuto āgato,
mn38:24.4_0: “Api nu tumhe, bhikkhave, evaṁ jānantā evaṁ passantā evaṁ vadeyyātha—
mn38:24.5_0: satthā no garu, satthugāravena ca mayaṁ evaṁ vademā”ti?
mn38:24.7_0: “Api nu tumhe, bhikkhave, evaṁ jānantā evaṁ passantā evaṁ vadeyyātha—
mn38:24.8_0: samaṇo evamāha, samaṇā ca nāma mayaṁ evaṁ vademā”ti?
mn38:24.10_0: “Api nu tumhe, bhikkhave, evaṁ jānantā evaṁ passantā aññaṁ satthāraṁ uddiseyyāthā”ti?
mn38:24.12_2: evaṁ jānantā evaṁ passantā yāni tāni puthusamaṇabrāhmaṇānaṁ vata kotūhalamaṅgalāni tāni sārato paccāgaccheyyāthā”ti?
mn38:24.14_0: “Nanu, bhikkhave, yadeva tumhākaṁ sāmaṁ ñātaṁ sāmaṁ diṭṭhaṁ sāmaṁ viditaṁ, tadeva tumhe vadethā”ti.
mn38:25.1_4: iminā sandiṭṭhikena dhammena akālikena ehipassikena opaneyyikena paccattaṁ veditabbena viññūhi.
mn38:25.2_0: Sandiṭṭhiko ayaṁ, bhikkhave, dhammo akāliko ehipassiko opaneyyiko paccattaṁ veditabbo viññūhi—
mn38:25.3_0: iti yantaṁ vuttaṁ, idametaṁ paṭicca vuttanti.
mn38:26.1_0: Tiṇṇaṁ kho pana, bhikkhave, sannipātā gabbhassāvakkanti hoti.
mn38:26.4_4: gandhabbo ca paccupaṭṭhito hoti—evaṁ tiṇṇaṁ sannipātā gabbhassāvakkanti hoti.
mn38:27.1_2: mātā nava vā dasa vā māse gabbhaṁ kucchinā pariharati mahatā saṁsayena garubhāraṁ.
mn38:27.2_2: mātā navannaṁ vā dasannaṁ vā māsānaṁ accayena vijāyati mahatā saṁsayena garubhāraṁ.
mn38:27.3_0: Tamenaṁ jātaṁ samānaṁ sakena lohitena poseti.
mn38:27.4_0: Lohitañhetaṁ, bhikkhave, ariyassa vinaye yadidaṁ mātuthaññaṁ.
mn38:28.1_0: Sa kho so, bhikkhave, kumāro vuddhimanvāya indriyānaṁ paripākamanvāya
mn38:28.2_0: yāni tāni kumārakānaṁ kīḷāpanakāni tehi kīḷati,
mn38:28.2_1: seyyathidaṁ—vaṅkakaṁ ghaṭikaṁ mokkhacikaṁ ciṅgulakaṁ pattāḷhakaṁ rathakaṁ dhanukaṁ.
mn38:29.1_0: Sa kho so, bhikkhave, kumāro vuddhimanvāya indriyānaṁ paripākamanvāya
mn38:29.3_0: cakkhuviññeyyehi rūpehi iṭṭhehi kantehi manāpehi piyarūpehi kāmūpasaṁhitehi rajanīyehi,
mn38:29.7_0: kāyaviññeyyehi phoṭṭhabbehi iṭṭhehi kantehi manāpehi piyarūpehi kāmūpasaṁhitehi rajanīyehi.
mn38:30.1_0: So cakkhunā rūpaṁ disvā piyarūpe rūpe sārajjati,
mn38:30.2_0: Tañca cetovimuttiṁ paññāvimuttiṁ yathābhūtaṁ nappajānāti yatthassa te pāpakā akusalā dhammā aparisesā nirujjhanti.
mn38:30.3_0: So evaṁ anurodhavirodhaṁ samāpanno yaṁ kiñci vedanaṁ vedeti sukhaṁ vā dukkhaṁ vā adukkhamasukhaṁ vā,
mn38:30.3_1: so taṁ vedanaṁ abhinandati abhivadati ajjhosāya tiṭṭhati.
mn38:30.4_0: Tassa taṁ vedanaṁ abhinandato abhivadato ajjhosāya tiṭṭhato uppajjati nandī.
mn38:30.11_0: manasā dhammaṁ viññāya piyarūpe dhamme sārajjati,
mn38:30.12_0: Tañca cetovimuttiṁ paññāvimuttiṁ yathābhūtaṁ nappajānāti yatthassa te pāpakā akusalā dhammā aparisesā nirujjhanti.
mn38:30.13_0: So evaṁ anurodhavirodhaṁ samāpanno yaṁ kiñci vedanaṁ vedeti sukhaṁ vā dukkhaṁ vā adukkhamasukhaṁ vā,
mn38:30.13_1: so taṁ vedanaṁ abhinandati abhivadati ajjhosāya tiṭṭhati.
mn38:30.14_0: Tassa taṁ vedanaṁ abhinandato abhivadato ajjhosāya tiṭṭhato uppajjati nandī.
mn38:31.1_2: tathāgato loke uppajjati arahaṁ sammāsambuddho vijjācaraṇasampanno sugato lokavidū anuttaro purisadammasārathi satthā devamanussānaṁ buddho bhagavā.
mn38:31.2_0: So imaṁ lokaṁ sadevakaṁ samārakaṁ sabrahmakaṁ sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiṁ pajaṁ sadevamanussaṁ sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā pavedeti.
mn38:31.3_0: So dhammaṁ deseti ādikalyāṇaṁ majjhekalyāṇaṁ pariyosānakalyāṇaṁ sātthaṁ sabyañjanaṁ;
mn38:32.1_0: Taṁ dhammaṁ suṇāti gahapati vā gahapatiputto vā aññatarasmiṁ vā kule paccājāto.
mn38:32.2_0: So taṁ dhammaṁ sutvā tathāgate saddhaṁ paṭilabhati.
mn38:32.3_0: So tena saddhāpaṭilābhena samannāgato iti paṭisañcikkhati:
mn38:32.5_0: Nayidaṁ sukaraṁ agāraṁ ajjhāvasatā ekantaparipuṇṇaṁ ekantaparisuddhaṁ saṅkhalikhitaṁ brahmacariyaṁ carituṁ.
mn38:32.6_0: Yannūnāhaṁ kesamassuṁ ohāretvā, kāsāyāni vatthāni acchādetvā, agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajeyyan’”ti.
mn38:32.7_0: So aparena samayena appaṁ vā bhogakkhandhaṁ pahāya,
mn38:33.1_0: So evaṁ pabbajito samāno bhikkhūnaṁ sikkhāsājīvasamāpanno pāṇātipātaṁ pahāya pāṇātipātā paṭivirato hoti,
mn38:33.1_1: nihitadaṇḍo nihitasattho lajjī dayāpanno sabbapāṇabhūtahitānukampī viharati.
mn38:33.2_1: dinnādāyī dinnapāṭikaṅkhī athenena sucibhūtena attanā viharati.
mn38:33.3_0: Abrahmacariyaṁ pahāya brahmacārī hoti, ārācārī virato methunā gāmadhammā.
mn38:33.4_1: saccavādī saccasandho theto paccayiko avisaṁvādako lokassa.
mn38:33.5_0: Pisuṇaṁ vācaṁ pahāya pisuṇāya vācāya paṭivirato hoti—ito sutvā na amutra akkhātā imesaṁ bhedāya,
mn38:33.5_1: amutra vā sutvā na imesaṁ akkhātā amūsaṁ bhedāya.
mn38:33.5_3: sahitānaṁ vā anuppadātā samaggārāmo samaggarato samagganandī,
mn38:33.6_0: Pharusaṁ vācaṁ pahāya pharusāya vācāya paṭivirato hoti—yā sā vācā nelā kaṇṇasukhā pemanīyā hadayaṅgamā
mn38:33.6_1: porī bahujanakantā bahujanamanāpā tathārūpiṁ vācaṁ bhāsitā hoti.
mn38:34.1_0: So santuṭṭho hoti kāyaparihārikena cīvarena kucchiparihārikena piṇḍapātena.
mn38:34.1_1: So yena yeneva pakkamati samādāyeva pakkamati.
mn38:34.2_0: Seyyathāpi nāma pakkhī sakuṇo yena yeneva ḍeti sapattabhārova ḍeti;
mn38:34.3_0: evameva bhikkhu santuṭṭho hoti kāyaparihārikena cīvarena,
mn38:34.3_2: So yena yeneva pakkamati samādāyeva pakkamati.
mn38:34.4_0: So iminā ariyena sīlakkhandhena samannāgato ajjhattaṁ anavajjasukhaṁ paṭisaṁvedeti.
mn38:35.1_0: So cakkhunā rūpaṁ disvā na nimittaggāhī hoti nānubyañjanaggāhī.
mn38:35.2_0: Yatvādhikaraṇamenaṁ cakkhundriyaṁ asaṁvutaṁ viharantaṁ abhijjhādomanassā pāpakā akusalā dhammā anvāssaveyyuṁ tassa saṁvarāya paṭipajjati,
mn38:35.7_0: manasā dhammaṁ viññāya na nimittaggāhī hoti nānubyañjanaggāhī.
mn38:35.8_0: Yatvādhikaraṇamenaṁ manindriyaṁ asaṁvutaṁ viharantaṁ abhijjhādomanassā pāpakā akusalā dhammā anvāssaveyyuṁ tassa saṁvarāya paṭipajjati,
mn38:35.9_0: So iminā ariyena indriyasaṁvarena samannāgato ajjhattaṁ abyāsekasukhaṁ paṭisaṁvedeti.
mn38:36.1_4: asite pīte khāyite sāyite sampajānakārī hoti,
mn38:36.1_6: gate ṭhite nisinne sutte jāgarite bhāsite tuṇhībhāve sampajānakārī hoti.
mn38:37.1_0: So iminā ca ariyena sīlakkhandhena samannāgato,
mn38:37.2_0: vivittaṁ senāsanaṁ bhajati—araññaṁ rukkhamūlaṁ pabbataṁ kandaraṁ giriguhaṁ susānaṁ vanapatthaṁ abbhokāsaṁ palālapuñjaṁ.
mn38:38.1_0: So pacchābhattaṁ piṇḍapātapaṭikkanto nisīdati pallaṅkaṁ ābhujitvā,
mn38:38.2_0: So abhijjhaṁ loke pahāya vigatābhijjhena cetasā viharati, abhijjhāya cittaṁ parisodheti;
mn38:38.5_0: uddhaccakukkuccaṁ pahāya anuddhato viharati ajjhattaṁ vūpasantacitto,
mn38:38.6_0: vicikicchaṁ pahāya tiṇṇavicikiccho viharati akathaṅkathī kusalesu dhammesu,
mn38:39.1_0: So ime pañca nīvaraṇe pahāya cetaso upakkilese paññāya dubbalīkaraṇe,
mn38:39.2_0: vivicceva kāmehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakkaṁ savicāraṁ vivekajaṁ pītisukhaṁ paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati.
mn38:39.3_2: bhikkhu vitakkavicārānaṁ vūpasamā ajjhattaṁ sampasādanaṁ cetaso ekodibhāvaṁ avitakkaṁ avicāraṁ samādhijaṁ pītisukhaṁ dutiyaṁ jhānaṁ …pe…
mn38:40.1_0: So cakkhunā rūpaṁ disvā piyarūpe rūpe na sārajjati,
mn38:40.2_0: Tañca cetovimuttiṁ paññāvimuttiṁ yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti yatthassa te pāpakā akusalā dhammā aparisesā nirujjhanti.
mn38:40.3_0: So evaṁ anurodhavirodhavippahīno yaṁ kiñci vedanaṁ vedeti,
mn38:40.3_1: sukhaṁ vā dukkhaṁ vā adukkhamasukhaṁ vā,
mn38:40.3_2: so taṁ vedanaṁ nābhinandati nābhivadati nājjhosāya tiṭṭhati.
mn38:40.4_0: Tassa taṁ vedanaṁ anabhinandato anabhivadato anajjhosāya tiṭṭhato yā vedanāsu nandī sā nirujjhati.
mn38:41.5_0: manasā dhammaṁ viññāya piyarūpe dhamme na sārajjati,
mn38:41.6_0: tañca cetovimuttiṁ paññāvimuttiṁ yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti yatthassa te pāpakā akusalā dhammā aparisesā nirujjhanti.
mn38:41.7_0: So evaṁ anurodhavirodhavippahīno yaṁ kiñci vedanaṁ vedeti,
mn38:41.7_1: sukhaṁ vā dukkhaṁ vā adukkhamasukhaṁ vā,
mn38:41.7_2: so taṁ vedanaṁ nābhinandati nābhivadati nājjhosāya tiṭṭhati.
mn38:41.8_0: Tassa taṁ vedanaṁ anabhinandato anabhivadato anajjhosāya tiṭṭhato yā vedanāsu nandī sā nirujjhati.
mn38:41.13_0: Attamanā te bhikkhū bhagavato bhāsitaṁ abhinandunti.
